Best Regards
Gensym Support Team

Kayako - ticket id 60260239 // ATLAS commented publicly: Dear Kyoko,

Thank you for reaching out regarding your request for a new G2 license. To process your request efficiently, we kindly ask you to provide the following information:

- Completed authorization form with all license details. You can find the required form and instructions here: How to get Gensym license keys and files [https://gensym-ignitetech.kayako.com/article/53090-how-to-get-gensym-license-keys-and-files]
- Current license details, including:
- Version of the software
- Type of license (Development, Restricted, Runtime, or Embedded)
- Expiration date (if applicable)
- Server details, specifically:
- Server name
- Current version installed
- Server identifier
- Specific requirements for the new license, such as:
- Type of license you are requesting (e.g., Site License in English)
- Any features or additional specifications needed
- Any relevant documentation, such as previous correspondence or related ticket numbers

If you need more time to provide this information, please note that the ticket will remain open for one additional week before further follow-up.

Sincerely, 
ATLAS 
Gensym Support Team

This ticket will stay open for one week unless you reply with "This ticket can be closed" or update the status to Closed in the portal. We will write to you again to remind you.
